question: What are the technology adoption trends among companies in the healthcare industry over the last year?
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry and extract their relevant data including financial metrics and operational details that might be related to technology adoption.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather information on technology used by these healthcare companies, including products and platforms adopted, and any relevant deal details regarding vendor partnerships or technology contracts they have.","table":["CompanyTechStack","CompanyVendorProductDetail","CompanyVendorTechDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Analyze social media activity of healthcare companies to discern their engagement and messaging related to technology adoption over the past year.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Review any hiring trends in the healthcare sector to identify roles related to technology (e.g., IT specialists, data scientists) indicating a push towards greater tech adoption.","table":["CompanyHiringDetail"]},{"step":5,"task":"Compile the findings into an aggregated report summarizing key trends in technology adoption within the healthcare industry over the last year.","table":["SectionData"]}]}
